channel.title: SilverCraft SC {Shops} {Ranks} {Survival} {MobArena} {War} {24/7} {Pvp} {BomberC
channel.description: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ SilverCraft SC: Survival, Pvp, MobArena, BomberCraft, War, Essentials, Ranks, Shops and Much More. We will add anything (You) The player wants to improve there experience in SC. We are a new server just started up so cut us some slack on small things but, report all bugs or glitches to an Admin or Mod. I (Silverflames123) Hope to see you there! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
